name: New Retro Blastwave
description:
New Retro Blastwave is a very relaxing rhytm game in which your task is to defend DJ from vicious attacks of enraged crowds. Enjoy synthwave aestethics and uncommon humour. Deal your attacks in rhythm of the music to send people flying!

Controls:

left arrow - walk left

right arrow - walk right

z - uppercut

x - push

c - laser

Created by:

Maciej Siwek

Kamil Przeździecki

Daniel Kowalski

Music: M|O|O|N - Hydrogen

All credit of the music to http://musicofthemoon.com/
